title: D&C 118
content: Revelation given through Joseph Smith the Prophet, at Far West, Missouri, July 8, 1838, in response to the supplication, “Show us thy will, O Lord, concerning the Twelve.”
, The Lord will provide for the families of the Twelve;
, Vacancies in the Twelve are filled.
Verily, thus saith the Lord: Let a conference be held immediately; let the Twelve be organized; and let men be appointed to
the place of those who are fallen.
